name: MARYLAND HOSPITAL ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Issues relating to Maryland hospitals, including Advancing All-Payer Health Equity Approaches and Development (AHEAD) model
Expiring healthcare extenders; Issues related to CMS regulations and effect on Maryland hospitals
Expiring healthcare extenders; Issues related to CMS regulations and effect on Maryland hospitals; Issues related to the expiration of the ACA's APTC (Advanced Premium Tax Credit)
